channel.title: Java heap error
channel.description:
[code] Loaded clipmap in 54ms. [ObjectDef] DONE LOADING OBJECT CONFIGURATION [Region] DONE LOADING REGION CONFIGURATIONS [6/12/12 7:25 PM]: Starting up Ravers-Fantasy ;D [6/12/12 7:25 PM]: Loaded 1024 doors in 439ms. [6/12/12 7:25 PM]: Loaded 274 Double doors in 31ms. [6/12/12 7:25 PM]: Loaded clipmap in 49ms. [6/12/12 7:25 PM]: Server listening on port 127.0.0.1:43594 [6/12/12 7:31 PM]: Average Cycle Time: 1ms [6/12/12 7:31 PM]: Players online: 0, engine load: 0.21% [6/12/12 7:32 PM]: [REGISTERED]: ravekitty [6/12/12 7:33 PM]: ravekitty - actionbutton: 9157 [6/12/12 7:33 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [6/12/12 7:33 PM]: java.lang.OutOf MemoryError: Java heap space [6/12/12 7:33 PM]: at server.util.Stream.ensureCapacity(Stream.java:365) [6/12/12 7:33 PM]: at server.util.Stream.writeString(Stream.java:256) [6/12/12 7:33 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.sendMessage(Client.java:8 13) [6/12/12 7:33 PM]: at server.model.players.Player.inClanWar(Player.java:921 ) [6/12/12 7:33 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1869)
[6/12/12 7:33 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:151) [6/12/12 7:33 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:218) [6/12/12 7:34 PM]: p r i n c e: character file not found. [6/12/12 7:35 PM]: p r i n c e: character file not found. [6/12/12 7:40 PM]: Exception in thread "Thread-3" [6/12/12 7:40 PM]: java.lang.O utOfMemoryError: Java heap space [6/12/12 7:40 PM]: at server.util.Stream.ensureCapacity(Stream.java:365) [6/12/12 7:40 PM]: at server.util.Stream.createFrameVarSize(Stream.java:175 ) [6/12/12 7:40 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.sendMessage(Client.java:8 12) [6/12/12 7:40 PM]: at server.model.players.Client$5.execute(Client.java:797 ) [6/12/12 7:40 PM]: at server.event.EventContainer.execute(EventContainer.ja va:51) [6/12/12 7:40 PM]: at server.event.EventManager.run(EventManager.java:101) [6/12/12 7:40 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) [/code] I'm trying to make clan wars. Using iterators and hashmaps. *-*

item.title: Java heap error
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Post the code that is throwing the error.

It happens when I select a dialogue option


		if (c.dialogueAction == 2345) {
		try {
		ClanWars.addToWait(c,2);
		 } catch (NullPointerException npe) {
	   npe.printStackTrace();
	  }				
		}

This is my add to wait method

	public static void addToWait(Client paramClient, int team) {

    if (team == 1) {
      if ((getHardPlayers() > getJumpPlayers()) && (getHardPlayers() > 0)) {
        paramClient.sendMessage("The JumpStyle team is full, try again later!");
        return;
      }
      if ((getJumpPlayers() >= getHardPlayers()) || (getHardPlayers() == 0)) {
        paramClient.sendMessage("You have been added to the JumpStyle team.");
     //   paramClient.sendMessage("Next War Begins In: " + (gameStartTimer * 3 + timeRemaining * 3) + " seconds.");
        waiting.put(paramClient, Integer.valueOf(team));
        paramClient.getPA().movePlayer(WAIT_ROOM[(team - 1)][0] + Misc.random(5), WAIT_ROOM[(team - 1)][1] + Misc.random(5), 0);
      }
    } else if (team == 2) {
      if ((getJumpPlayers() > getHardPlayers()) && (getJumpPlayers() > 0)) {
        paramClient.sendMessage("The HardStyle team is full, try again later!");
        return;
      }
    } else if (team == 3) {
      addToWait(paramClient, getJumpPlayers() > getHardPlayers() ? 1 : 2);
      return;
    }
  }

Read full topic
